channel.title: OS RS Buddy
channel.description:
Hate using the webclient? Don't want to download a 50mb+ external client? I introduce to you OS RS Buddy!
OS RS Buddy, or just RS Buddy for short, is a RS client launcher with a few notable perks.
* Extremely fast load time (approx 3 seconds after first launch) * Hiscores lookup for any OS player * Item shop preview (with player names, prices, and details of how to contact them) * Silabsoft's never full world implementation (worlds will never appear "FULL")
[img]http://rscbot.com/rscbot/img/osrs/mainscreen.png[/img]
[img]http://rscbot.com/rscbot/img/osrs/hiscores.png[/img]
[img]http://rscbot.com/rscbot/img/osrs/shop.png[/img]
